Attribute.Name: CalculatedMinTemp
Attribute.ValueTemplate:
<derive expr="{
    value1:=IF(
        PRODUNIT('MinimumTemperature')="°F",
        value('MinimumTemperature', 'unece.unit.CEL'),
        value('MinimumTemperature', 'unece.unit.FAH')
    ),
    value2:=if(
                   round(value1, 2)="NaN"," ",round(value1, 2)
	   )
}
concatenate(
    value2,
     IF(
        PRODUNIT('MinimumTemperature')="°F",
        " °C",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('MinimumTemperature')="°C",
        " °F",
        ""
    )
)"/>

MetaData.Value: It is used to store the converted MinTemp Value.
